 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חָבָא‎</span>] **verb** ==withdraw, hide== (not in **Qal**); compare also <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חבה‎</span> (Late Hebrew ***id.***; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***—abû***</u></abbr> [[BDB#Dl|Dl]]<sup>Pr 175</sup>; [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] Ethpa\`al ***hide oneself***) — 

**Niph\`al** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נֶחְבָּא‎</span> [[Judg.9.5|Judg 9:5]] + [[1Sam.10.22|1Sam 10:22]]; [[2Sam.17.9|2Sam 17:9]] (both may be ***participle***); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נַחְבֵּאתָ‎</span> [[Gen.31.37|Gen 31:37]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְנַחְ‎</span> consecutive [[1Sam.19.2|1Sam 19:2]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נֶחְבְּאוּֿ‎</span> [[Josh.10.27|Josh 10:27]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נֶחְבָּ֑אוּ‎</span> [[Job.29.8|Job 29:8]]; [[Job.29.10|Job 29:10]] ***Imperfect*** 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תֵּחָבֵא‎</span> [[Job.5.21|Job 5:21]] ***Infinitive construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֵחָבֵא‎</span> [[2Chr.18.24|2Chr 18:24]]; [[Dan.10.7|Dan 10:7]] ***Participle*** plural (compare also ***above***) <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נֶחְבְּאִים‎</span> [[Josh.10.17|Josh 10:17]], etc. — ***hide oneself*** in fear [[Gen.3.10|Gen 3:10]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), [[Josh.10.16|Josh 10:16]]; [[Josh.10.17|Josh 10:17]]; [[Josh.10.27|Josh 10:27]] (all [[BDB#J|J]] [[BDB#E|E]]), [[Judg.9.5|Judg 9:5]]; [[1Sam.19.2|1Sam 19:2]]; [[2Sam.17.9|2Sam 17:9]]; [[Amos.9.3|Amos 9:3]]; [[2Chr.18.24|2Chr 18:24]]; [[Dan.10.7|Dan 10:7]] from modesty [[1Sam.10.22|1Sam 10:22]] compare [[Job.29.8|Job 29:8]] also <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לָ֫מָּה נַחְבֵּאתָ לִבְרֹחַ‎</span> [[Gen.31.27|Gen 31:27]] ([[BDB#E|E]]), i.e. why didst thou flee secretly? passive, ***be hidden*** [[Job.29.10|Job 29:10]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קול נְגִידִים‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נְחְבָ֑אוּ‎</span> (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ולשׁונם לְחִכָּם דָּבֵ֑קָה‎</span>, compare also see 9) i.e. in reverence, = ***hushed*** (so we speak of a ***veiled*** voice); be hidden for protection <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בִּשׁוֺט לָשׁוֺן‎</span> [[Job.5.21|Job 5:21]]. **Pu\`al** ***Perfect*** 3 plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֻבְּאוּ‎</span> ***have been hidden*** (= are made to hide themselves, [[BDB#Di|Di]] ***on the passage***) [[Job.24.4|Job 24:4]]. **Hiph\`il** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֶחְבִּיאָ֑נִי‎</span> [[Isa.49.2|Isa 49:2]] 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֶחְבְּאַ֔תָֹה‎</span> [[Josh.6.17|Josh 6:17]], compare [[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:75»§ 75</sup>, Rem. 21 ***a*** [[BDB#Kö|Kö]]<sup>i. 624 ff. etc.</sup>; ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיַּחְבִּיאֵם‎</span> [[1Kgs.18.4|1Kgs 18:4]] 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַתַּחְבִּא‎</span> [[2Kgs.6.29|2Kgs 6:29]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וָאַחְבִּא‎</span> [[1Kgs.18.13|1Kgs 18:13]] — ***hide***, transitive, with accusative [[Josh.6.17|Josh 6:17]]; [[Josh.6.25|Josh 6:25]]; [[1Kgs.18.4|1Kgs 18:4]]; [[1Kgs.18.13|1Kgs 18:13]]; [[2Kgs.6.29|2Kgs 6:29]] metaphor, of divine protection [[Isa.49.2|Isa 49:2]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּצֵל יָדוֺ ה‎</span>. **Hoph\`al** ***Perfect be hidden*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הָחְבָּ֑אוּ‎</span> [[Isa.42.22|Isa 42:22]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּבָתֵּי כלאים‎</span>), i.e. imprisoned. **Hithpa\`el** ***Perfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִתְחַבְּאוּ‎</span> [[1Sam.14.11|1Sam 14:11]] ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִתְחַבֵּא‎</span> [[1Sam.23.23|1Sam 23:23]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִּתְ‎</span> [[Gen.3.8|Gen 3:8]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִתְחַבָּ֑אוּ‎</span> [[Job.38.30|Job 38:30]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִּתְחַבְּאוּ‎</span> [[1Sam.13.6|1Sam 13:6]] ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִתְחַבֵּא‎</span> [[2Kgs.11.3|2Kgs 11:3]] + 2 t.; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִתְחַבְּאִים‎</span> [[1Sam.14.22|1Sam 14:22]]; [[1Chr.21.20|1Chr 21:20]] — 

**1.** ***draw back, hide oneself***, usually with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּ‎</span> local; [[Gen.3.8|Gen 3:8]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), [[1Sam.13.6|1Sam 13:6]]; [[1Sam.14.11|1Sam 14:11]]; [[1Sam.14.22|1Sam 14:22]]; [[1Sam.23.23|1Sam 23:23]]; [[2Kgs.11.3|2Kgs 11:3]]; [[1Chr.21.20|1Chr 21:20]]; [[2Chr.22.9|2Chr 22:9]]; [[2Chr.22.12|2Chr 22:12]]. 

**2.** ***draw together, thicken, harden***, of water becoming ice [[Job.38.30|Job 38:30]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כאבן‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מים יִתְחַ‎</span>.
